ApiKeyAuth.name: id_token
ApiKeyAuth.description:
This uses authenticaion token generated with a secret obtained from keycloak, the token can be sent both as a cookie named id_token or in the auth_key property of the election object. [More information about token generation can be found here](https://github.com/Equal-Vote/star-server/blob/6fdb2f653266b5f2710f0701509f54e1e558ecc1/docs/api.md)

For API testing [log in here](https://keycloak.prod.equal.vote/realms/Prod/protocol/openid-connect/auth?client_id=web&response_type=code&redirect_uri=https://bettervoting.com/API/Docs&scope=openid)
